lines.text: For a buck, you'd double-cross your own mother.
Why not? She'd do the same to me.
What about that girl who sings?
Every man has a girl who sings someplace in his life.
You know, you're quite an attractive man.
How far do you want me to go?
I'm at the plate. You're doing the pitching.

[Thinking that Dave is trying to take advantage of him]
Stop tryin' to dizzy me up!
You say that like it was spelt in capital letters.
